I know, I know. Mopping about it won't help. Being mad, won't help. But what are we even supposed to do?
It happens, but you must focus on what's best for Cetus.
Yeah... you're right. I just... have to keep my head up and focus on the goal. I believe in Cetus, he just needs time.
... I guess so. Orcas are pretty complicated too, all animals are. I'm sure if the roles were reversed, Cetus would be conflicted too.
Ah, you're surprisingly good at spontaneous pep talks, ya know that?
Alright. I guess that's enough moping around here for now. We're all tired, it's late, and I imagine Cetus is out of it too.
It's going to take a lot of work to pick up where we've been left, but somehow... I feel like it's gonna turn out alright.
Goodnight, bud. We'll figure this out, I promise. Rest well, okay?
Hey, it's Cetus's friends. I almost can't believe their timing.
Those dolphins have been good friends to him so far. And they're increidbly empathetic creatures. They must've noticed how quiet Cetus has been and came to check on him.
Wait... you don't think...!
Cetus... are you... going to join them?
They're you're friends, Cetus. They might be a bit different from you but...
Family comes in all shapes.
I know, bud. It's scary. But you're ready! I know you are. You've earned this.
And remember what I said to you before. We'll still be friends. No matter how far apart we are. I'll still think of you, even though I know you'll be okay without me.

And you can always come visit your friends here! Even if I'm gone, @ will still be around. And maybe, someday, the stars will align, and I can come back in the future! And we'll see each other again...
You'll do great, I know it.
It's been one heck of a ride, bud. I'll see you around, yeah?
And there he goes...
Hey, uh. I don't... really want to be alone right now. Do you wanna chill at the inn for a bit? We could just talk, or sit around or...
I see.
